Pranayama refers to the "fourth limb" of Ashtanga Yoga, of which there are eight. All about the art of breath control, learning to breathe properly not only brings more oxygen to the blood and brain, it is also believed to help rule over Prana, or life energy. Breathwork is an essential component of yoga, with Pranayama one of the first lessons taught to new yogis. Join Travis on this journey and get ready to go inward! Go back to the basics of your practice and enjoy working on that powerful connection.
